text: Tamagerfa hu'za hageri ankenaregama nemaniza vahe'mo'za Ra Anumzamo'nama zamazama hanugura nagrite zamavua kete'za nemani'nageno, Tasisi kumate vahe'mo'za egota hu'za ne-eza ne'mofavre nagaka'a afeteti ventefi zamavarente'za ne-eza, ana ventefina rama'a silvane golinena erinente'za egahaze. E'inama hazana kagri'ma kazeri so'ema hugenka'ma so'e kagima eri'nanaza nege'za, Ra Anumzana tamagri Anumzama Israeli nagamotare'ma ruotage'ma hu'noa Anumzamo'na ra nagi namiku anara hugahaze.
